channel.title: [InsidiaX] Bank all
channel.description:
when i click the bank all button my client freezes for a couple of seconds does someone know how to fix it that it doesn't freeze?
~xX4m4zingXx~

item.title: [InsidiaX] Bank all
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

runescape sucks:

I’m almost positive that there is a method for items that finds the amount of items in a stack, rather than trying to bank 2147000000 of those items.

Yep.
Use this (it’s not perfect but it’s better):

case 89223: // Deposit Inventory for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i] - 1, c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.playerItems[i] - 1), c.playerItemsN[i]); } c.sendMessage("You successfully bank all items from your inventory."); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [InsidiaX] Bank all
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

This is the block of coding

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); } } break;
and no error in client.
only when i open bank i get this:
this is when i click on it with a couple of tiles between it

Error: T2 - 53,53,126 - 2120,2875,3546 - 21,6,2,-68,-1,0,0,-12,1,8,1,-1,0,0,-72, 11,-4,1,-1,0,0,96,1,57,5,-1,3,35,45,87,100,3,2,94,3,1,43,53,1,47,45,0,-128,0,0,- 128,0,0,-128,0,
this is when i click on it when i am before it

Error: T2 - 53,53,253 - 2120,2875,3546 - 21,6,2,-68,-1,0,0,-12,1,8,1,-1,0,0,-72, 11,-4,1,-1,0,0,96,1,57,5,-1,3,35,45,87,100,3,2,94,3,1,43,53,1,47,45,0,-128,0,0,- 128,0,0,-128,0,

item.title: [InsidiaX] Bank all
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Clearly your code block for banking all items is resource-heavy OR another idea is if your bank has so many items that the outgoing interface items packet is very big and so takes a lot of time to parse.

Read full topic
